TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Brushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一组预定义的 对象。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 中的颜色名称与 .NET Framework、Windows 窗体和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]中的颜色名称匹配。Color names in Windows Presentation Foundation match the color names in the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]. 这些颜色及其名称基于 UNIX X11 颜色值。These colors and their names are based on the UNIX X11 color values. 下图显示了每个预定义画笔的颜色、其名称和十六进制值。The following image shows the color of each predefined brush, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![预定义颜色](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "预定义颜色")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 颜色表，包括颜色样本、颜色名称和十六进制值Color table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 请参阅类，了解用于绘制区域的各种其他更复杂的方法。See the class for a variety of other, more complex, ways that you can paint an area. 例如，尝试使用渐变（、 ）或图像（）。For example, try using gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 你不能在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]声明此托管类，但可以使用其静态属性在中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]分配值。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AliceBlue As SolidColorBrush
public: static property System::Windows::Media::SolidColorBrush ^ AliceBlue { System::Windows::Media::SolidColorBrush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取具有十六进制值 #FFF0F8FF 的纯色填充颜色。

span.span: Gets the solid fill color that has a hexadecimal value of #FFF0F8FF.
A frozen with a of #FFF0F8FF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此属性返回的画笔已冻结（其属性为`true`），因此不能对其进行动画处理。Because the brush returned by this property is frozen (its property is `true`), it can't be animated. 有关如何对 System.windows.media.solidcolorbrush> 进行动画处理的信息，请参阅[如何：对 system.windows.media.solidcolorbrush> 的颜色或不透明度进行动画处理](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-the-color-or-opacity-of-a-solidcolorbrush.md)。For information about how to animate a SolidColorBrush, see [How to: Animate the Color or Opacity of a SolidColorBrush](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-the-color-or-opacity-of-a-solidcolorbrush.md). 有关使用情况信息（包括示例）以及预定义系统颜色列表，请参阅类页。 See the class page for usage information, including examples, and for a listing of predefined system colors. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
